page.description: Defines an alias for the "program id" of an ActiveX control.
page.syntax: OLE.Set( Alias as C, Program_ID as C )

argument.name: Alias
argument.description: The alias to be applied to an ActiveX control.

argument.name: Program_ID
argument.description: The program Id of an ActiveX control.

page.discussion: The OLE.Set() method defines an alias for the "program id" of an ActiveX control. The program Id is defined by the company that writes the ActiveX control. In the case of Internet Explorer, the program Id is "shell.explorer".
page.example:
a = ole.Alias_Object() a.Set("MyOwnName","dhtmledit.dhtmledit") h.class = "MyOwnName"
dim h.object as P ui_modeless_dlg_box("x","{activex=100,20h}")
